sent.orig: WHO says environmental hazards can cause miscarriage, still birth, low birth weight and birth defects.
sent.trans: 世卫组织称环境危害可能导致流产，死胎，出生体重不足，婴儿先天性缺陷。

sent.orig: Has anyone ever re-entered the womb after birth to describe what birth is like?
sent.trans: 从来没有任何出生的人再来到子宫里，告诉我们出生到底是怎么回事！

sent.orig: Does the Caesarean birth inner the half a year need to make birth control go over?
sent.trans: 剖腹产半年内需要做避孕节育检查吗？

sent.orig: The BIRTH HOLOGRAM is defined by birth time.
sent.trans: 另一个出生时刻全息图，则由出生时刻定义。

sent.orig: Birth or Death? There a Birth, certainly.
sent.trans: 诞生或死亡？肯定是诞生。
